plot: The love lives of two technology-obsessed best friends in Chicago. From Instagram seduction to inappropriate selfies, Liv and Skylar are about to learn the real-life consequences of over-indulgence in the virtual world.
plot_en: The love lives of two technology-obsessed best friends in Chicago. From Instagram seduction to inappropriate selfies, Liv and Skylar are about to learn the real-life consequences of over-indulgence in the virtual world.

title: #Hashtag: The Series
